casebody.data:
No. 15,

Original.

State of Oklahoma v. State of Texas, United States, intervener. Submitted November 19, 1923. Decided November 26, 1923. Mr. Cordenio A. Severance and Mr.,. Edward P. Keech, Jr., for petitioner. Mr. Solicitor Geni eral Beck, Mr. Assistant Attorney General Riter and Mr: W. W. Dyar, Special Assistants the Attorney General, for the United States.

Motion for leave to file petition in intervention of Charles West in this cause denied.
